snippet.title: Alone: Recode  Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for Alone: Recode.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1728130/Alone_Recode/

Step into the world of Alone - a new take on the classic turn-based fantasy RPG. Featuring challenging bosses and asymmetric world design Alone will defy your expectations of gameplay and exploration. Whether you are an RPG veteran or new to the genre, you must experience Alone.

Alone: Recode is available on Steam starting 09-24-2021

If you are a creator and would like to play the game early or review it the woovit campaign link is here.

https://woovit.info/alone-recode

The codes become available on 9/18/2021 and the campaign will run until 9/30/21 after which the codes will no longer be available.
